channel.title: How to make a catchy song/chords
channel.description: I had an awesome melody in my head and decided to make a video about it. It actually turned out to be a pretty nice melody and I might turn it into a full track in the future. Take a look https://youtu.be/i1HKp64UOHw

item.title: How to make a catchy song/chords
item.dc:creator: DJ_La_Rocca
item.description:
@Bryn I can’t do commentary unfortunately because the audio will not work if I talk.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a catchy song/chords

item.title: How to make a catchy song/chords
item.dc:creator: Bryn
item.description:
I thought the video was a nice capture of your creative process and the mix was nice. For a ‘how to’ video, I was expecting some commentary rather than just watching you use the app.

Read full topic
